name: Debitsuccess
author: debitsucess

sections.description:
A full service direct debit initiator with a presence in Australia, New Zealand and the United States, Debitsuccess delivers premier experience across e-commerce services for a wide range of industries.

Working with a raft of subscription-based businesses, we’re committed to helping you implement user-friendly, efficient and cost-effective direct debit systems to complement your online payment applications. Going above and beyond to help you achieve your business goals, Debitsuccess is your trusted provider for reliable flexible payment solutions.

Debitsuccess Features

  • One platform for all payment types and related services
  • No redirection – user stays entirely on your website for payment
  • Fast checkout that allows users to save their payment details
  • Easy configuration for all payment methods
  • One platform for all relevant payment methods (Credit & Debit cards, Direct Debit, Bank Transfer etc.)
sections.installation:
You can install this plugin one of three ways:

1. Admin Search

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add.
  2. Search for Debitsuccess.
  3. Find the plugin that’s labeled Debitsuccess.
  4. Look for the author name Debitsuccess on the plugin.
  5. Click to install.
  6. Activate the plugin.

2. Download & Upload

  1. Download the plugin (a zip file) on the right column of this page.
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add.
  3. Select the tab “Upload”.
  4. Upload the .zip file you just downloaded.
  5. Activate the plugin.

3. FTP Upload

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page.
  2. Unzip the zip file contents.
  3. Upload the Debitsuccess folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your site.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

short_description: Accept all major credit cards directly on your WooCommerce site in a seamless and secure checkout environment with Debitsuccess Commerce.
